page.contents_html:
Established in 2017, formerly known as the Project Department of Mavin Group, Mavinex Joint Stock Company is known as the developer of key projects of  Mavin Group in designing and constructing animal feed factories & breeding farms. Over the past years, Mavinex has implemented dozens of key projects of Mavin group, including: Aqua feedmill building project in Hung Yen with a capacity of 45,000 tons/year; Nghe An animal feedmill with a capacity of 300,000 tons/ year; and Dong Thap feedmill with a capacity of 350,000 tons / year.

The harmonious combination of equipment technology of the world's leading brands of Buhler, Vandesen, Chronos ... and the creation of Mavinex’s engineers have been building up “state of the art” animal feedmills. The application of 4.0 technology helps Mavin reduce production and operation costs, increase labor productivity and protect the environment and the health of producers and consumers.

In the field of animal farming, Mavinex also implements dozens of large projects such as the 1,200 GGPs pig farm in Hung Viet - Hung Yen, the farm of 1,500 GGPs pig farm in Nhon Tan - Binh Dinh and hundreds of GPs pig farms, duck farms and chicken farms nationwide. Thanks to the application of advanced technologies such as automatic feeding systems, automatic sanitation and environmental treatment systems, automatic temperature adjustment system, etc., that helps animals have the best conditions for growth and development, thereby optimizing breeding efficiency and ensure environmentally friendly farming.

In the field of aquaculture, the Company offers the technology of Norwegian round cages with a large breeding volume, resilience against high winds and storms, suitable for concentrated farming in coastal areas or hydro power reservoirs, with high electricity yields and high quality of commercial fish.

With the goal of bringing high-quality products not only to projects of Mavin group but also to domestic and foreign customers, Mavinex Joint Stock Company is committed to preserving ourr core values, promoting our advantages competency, cooperating with partners, bringing prosperous development to customers, shareholders and social community.
